thread.title: 3 dead, 6 missing in coal mine collapse in Philippines
thread.title_full: 3 dead, 6 missing in coal mine collapse in Philippines

title: 3 dead, 6 missing in coal mine collapse in Philippines
text:
Fri, Jul 17, 2015, 12:19 PM AEST - Australia Markets close in 3 hrs 41 mins 3 dead, 6 missing in coal mine collapse in Philippines Philippine governor says 3 dead, at least 6 missing in coal mine pit collapse Associated Press â€“ 11 minutes ago Recommend Print 
MANILA, Philippines (AP) -- A governor in the central Philippines says three workers have died and at least six others are missing after a wall of a coal mining pit collapsed after days of rains. 
Antique provincial Gov. Rhodora Cadiao says she ordered the operator to stop work at the open Panian pit on Semirara Island until the six missing workers have been found. 
Cadiao says by phone that days of rains preceded the mining accident but investigators have to determine what caused it. 
A similar mining accident in 2013 in Semirara in Antique, about 350 kilometers (215 miles) south of Manila, killed at least 5 workers. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Terms
